{"id":413390588,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1603725330,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/413390588/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Champagne Tower","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double champagneTower(int poured, int query_row, int query_glass) {\n        vector<vector<double>> glasses(101, vector<double>(101, 0.0));\n        glasses[0][0] = poured;\n        for (int i = 0; i < 100; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {\n                double excess = max(0.0, (glasses[i][j] - 1.0)/2);\n                glasses[i][j] = min(1.0 , glasses[i][j]);\n                if (i == query_row && j == query_glass) {\n                    return glasses[i][j];\n                }\n                glasses[i + 1][j] += excess;\n                glasses[i + 1][j + 1] += excess;\n            }\n        }\n        return glasses[query_row][query_glass];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"champagne-tower"}
